ygData.msgSnippet: Double Punch/Punch (AKA Counter Punch)/Bumblebee/Injector/Ramhorn: Double Punch got out of his CR chamber, heading for his quarters. ... Injector heard a knock

Double Punch/Punch (AKA Counter Punch)/Bumblebee/Injector/Ramhorn:



Double Punch got out of his CR chamber, heading for his quarters.

---

Injector heard a knock at the door, taking out his stinger missile launcher, 
he opened it. Seeing Double Punch, he let him in.  "How's our guest?" Double 
Punch asked with a smile.

"Just fine!" Ramhorn yelled, getting up quickly, transforming to beast mode 
and surging forward, slamming Double Punch and Ramhorn aside, knocking them 
both out.  Taking Injector's stinger missile launcher, he set his plan into 
motion.  Taking out a hologram cube, he activated it.  His body suddenly 
became red and grey, his optics a bright crimson.  The Maximal symbols on his 
body turned to bright yellow Predacon symbols.  The Ancient Cybertronian 
writing on his chest was replaced by a picture of the original Megatron's 
face.  Walking out of the door after locking it, he put the stinger missile 
launcher away, strolling through the corridors, towards the exit of the 
Predacon base.

---

Bumblebee got out of his CR chamber, walking towards the bridge of the 
Predacon base.

===

Nearly to the Alliance base, Counter Punch looked around, no one around.  
"Counter Punch, transform." Going to robot mode, he once again looked around 
nervously.  "Puncherize!" he yelled, transforming into Punch, no symbols on 
his body unlike Counter Puch.  Transforming into Punch's beast mode, a 
kangaroo, he hopped twenty feet forward each "hop", heading for the 
Alliance's base.
